https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8ITs6ehhPnuEB9A3QyvCWi5NXhC.jpg Two best friends Nora and Candy have grown up to have very different lifestyles. Candy still in her glory days is a party girl while Nora is now a devoted housewife. When Candy decides to swap her lifestyle with Nora s for one day everyone s fantasies are fulfilled as the ladies enjoy an erotic night as sexy housewives with new husbands A Housewife Named Candy
